verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto Moses <WH4872>, and spake <WH1696> unto him out of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH120>, When any man of you offereth <WH7126> an oblation <WH7133> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, ye shall offer <WH7126> your oblation <WH7133> of the cattle <WH929>, even of the herd <WH1241> and of the flock <WH6629>.

If his oblation <WH7133> be a burnt-offering <WH7133> of the herd <WH1241>, he shall offer <WH7126> it a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>: he shall <WH7522> offer <WH7126> it at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, that he may be accepted before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And he shall lay <WH5564> his hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the burnt-offering <WH5930>; and it shall be accepted <WH7521> for him to make atonement for him <WH3722>.

And he shall kill <WH7819> the bullock <WH1121> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, the priests <WH3548>, shall present <WH7126> the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196> that is at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.
And he shall flay <WH6584> the burnt-offering <WH5930>, and cut <WH5408> it into its pieces <WH5409>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> shall put <WH5414> fire <WH784> upon the altar <WH4196>, and lay wood <WH6086> in order <WH6186> upon the fire <WH784>;

and Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, the priests <WH3548>, shall lay <WH6186> the pieces <WH7218>, the head, and the fat <WH6309>, in order <WH6186> upon the wood <WH6086> that is on the fire <WH784> which is upon the altar <WH4196>:

but its inwards <WH7130> and its legs <WH3767> shall he wash <WH7364> with water <WH4325>. And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the whole on the altar <WH4196>, for a burnt-offering <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And if his oblation <WH7133> be of the flock <WH6629>, of the sheep <WH3775>, or of the goats <WH5795>, for a burnt-offering <WH5930>; he shall offer <WH7126> it a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>.

And he shall kill <WH7819> it on the side <WH3409> of the altar <WH4196> northward <WH6828> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and Aaron <WH175>'s sons <WH1121>, the priests <WH3548>, shall sprinkle <WH2236> its blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.

And he shall cut <WH5408> it into its pieces <WH5409>, with its head <WH7218> and its fat <WH6309>; and the priest <WH3548> shall lay them in order <WH6186> on the wood <WH6086> that is on the fire <WH784> which is upon the altar <WH4196>:

but the inwards <WH7130> and the legs <WH3767> shall he wash <WH7364> with water <WH4325>. And the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH7126> the whole <WH6999>, and burn it upon the altar <WH4196>: it is a burnt-offering <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And if his oblation <WH7133> to Jehovah <WH3068> be a burnt-offering <WH5930> of birds <WH5775>, then he shall offer <WH7126> his oblation <WH7133> of turtle-doves <WH8449>, or of young <WH1121> pigeons <WH3123>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> it unto the altar <WH4196>, and wring off <WH4454> its head <WH7218>, and burn <WH6999> it on the altar <WH4196>; and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall be drained out <WH4680> on the side <WH7023> of the altar <WH4196>;

and he shall take away <WH5493> its crop <WH4760> with the filth <WH5133> thereof <WH7993>, and cast it beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> on the east part <WH6924>, in the place <WH4725> of the ashes <WH1880>:

and he shall rend <WH8156> it by the wings <WH3671> thereof <WH914>, but shall not divide it asunder. And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196>, upon the wood <WH6086> that is upon the fire <WH784>: it is a burnt-offering <WH5930>, an offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
